headline: Eversource Energy (ES) Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates
summary: Eversource (ES) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.05% and -10.91%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Eversource Energy (ES) Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates

headline: Eversource: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: SPRINGFIELD, Mass. AP) — Eversource Energy (ES) on Thursday reported second-quarter earnings of $352.7 million. On a per-share basis, the Springfield, Massachusetts-based company said it had profit of 96 cents.

raw.headline: Eversource: Q2 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Eversource Energy Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, July 31, 2025--Eversource Energy (NYSE: ES) today reported earnings of $352.7 million, or $0.96 per share, for the second quarter of 2025, compared with earnings of $335.3 million, or $0.95 per share, for the second quarter of 2024. For the first half of 2025, Eversource Energy reported earnings of $903.5 million, or $2.45 per share, compared with earnings of $857.2 million, or $2.43 per share, for the first half of 2024.
